raw_answer: 解:如图,过C点作CP∥AB,交DE于P,∵PC∥AE,∴△AEM∽△CPM,∴\frac{PC}{AE}=\frac{CM}{AM},∵M是AC的中点,∴AM=CM,∴PC=AE,∵AE=\frac{1}{4}AB,∴CP=\frac{1}{4}AB,∴CP=\frac{1}{3}BE,∵CP∥BE,∴△DCP∽△DBE,∴\frac{CP}{BE}=\frac{CD}{BD}=\frac{1}{3},∴BD=3CD,∴BC=2CD,即\frac{BC}{CD}=2．故选:B．
